name: Flag Matcher
description:
Even if you're not a pirate on the high seas, or a hooligan at the World Cup, being able to correctly identify the national flags of the world can be a useful skill. Playing this game will teach you how to do that.

Match a flag with the name of its country to earn points. The faster you make the matches, the more points you get. (See the screenshots for details of how the scoring works.)

The free version of the app displays only the flags of countries in North America and Western Europe. The paid version of the app displays the flags of more than 100 countries from around the world, with more to come.
